The Resizer is a resizable container widget.

It allows to be resized (not moved), normally in the right and/or bottom directions. It is an alternative to splitters.

Example

Here is a little example of how to use the widget.

  var resizer = new qx.ui.container.Resizer().set({
    width: 200,
    height: 100
  });

  resizer.setLayout(new qx.ui.layout.Canvas());
  var text = new qx.ui.form.TextArea("Resize me\nI'm resizable");
  resizer.add(text, {edge: 0});

  this.getRoot().add(resizer);

This example creates a resizer, configures it with a canvas layout and adds a text area to it.
